name: Meta Platforms, Inc.
summary: Meta Platforms, Inc., formerly known as Facebook, Inc., is a leading American technology company that owns and operates major social media and communication platforms including Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, Messenger, and Threads. Headquartered in Menlo Park, California, Meta is a global leader in digital advertising, artificial intelligence, and virtual/augmented reality, with a market capitalization exceeding $1.76 trillion as of June 2025. The company was founded in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg and is recognized as one of the world’s most influential technology firms.
